name: Terroir
author: Peter Santerre aka ShockValue
description: A collection of high-quality, focused Eurorack modules.

modules.name: Lure
modules.description: A bias-centered, force-field-driven Brownian walk. Output is shaped by pull gravity, softened edge repulsion, and CV-modulatable parameters including Speed, Bias, and Pull. The result is a smooth, organic voltage source that explores a defined range with tunable drift behavior.

modules.name: Thrum
modules.description: A pulsing CV/audio generator inspired by mechanical heartbeats or rotating beacons. Creates rhythmic envelopes or acts as a drone source using internal samples. Can be triggered externally or run free. Features non-linear duration control (0.05s-3.0s), duty cycle, bias, sample selection, and CV inputs with bipolar attenuverters for major parameters.
